review_data.title: Where the locals eat
review_data.content: Though the food was good and ample, the culinary artistry suggested by its name was not in evidence. This seems mainly a place where the locals go. It is unpretentious, mostly Swiss and reasonable. They have daily specials that include something additional to the main...More

review_data.title: Small, but nice coffee house with lunch
review_data.content: Escoffier is a small, but nice coffee house (or restaurant) with in- and outdoor seating 20meters from the tramstop Feldeggstrasse. They offer breakfast, some lunch menus, afternoon cakes and rather early dinner (they close at 19h). We had a late breakfast (scrambled eggs) and as...More

review_data.title: Not much for atmosphere
review_data.content: Restaurant Café Escoffier is located just around the corner from Seefeldstrasse and easily accessed with Tram 2/4 to Feldeggstrasse. The place has a nice row of sidewalk tables with a nice, quiet view. Inside, the place has a very basic and not very imaginative atmosphere,...More
